title: Tell Halawa
description: Tell in the Hamrin Basin with settlement remains from the Early Dynastic, Early Akkadian, Late Akkadian, Ur III, Old Babylonian, and Partho-Sassanian periods. The site was flooded by the creation of Lake Hamrin in 1981.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Tell Halawa after Yaseen 1995.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Tell Halawa
